meanings.definition: Relating to or involving multiple jurisdictions.
meanings.sent1: The interjurisdictional agreement was signed by two neighboring states.
meanings.sent2: The court case involved an interjurisdictional dispute between two counties.
meanings.sent3: The interjurisdictional picnic brought together people from various areas for a fun day out.
meanings.sent4: The interjurisdictional nature of the investigation required cooperation between different police departments.
meanings.sent5: The interjurisdictional boundaries were clearly marked on the map for easy reference.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring between different legal jurisdictions.
meanings.sent1: The interjurisdictional issue arose when conflicting laws applied to the same situation.
meanings.sent2: The interjurisdictional treaty aimed to streamline legal processes between the two countries.
meanings.sent3: The interjurisdictional mix-up in court led to a humorous misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: The interjurisdictional hurdles in the legal system needed to be addressed for smoother operations.
meanings.sent5: The interjurisdictional complexities of the case required expert legal advice.
